summary: A decorator that configures a workflow step to run on a Kubernetes cluster, specifying compute resources, container image, security credentials, storage options, and runtime parameters for isolated, scalable execution.
business_intent: Allow users to declaratively run individual steps of a Metaflow pipeline on Kubernetes with precise control over CPU, memory, disk, GPU, container image, service account, secrets, node selection, volume mounts, and other execution settings, enabling efficient resource utilization and reproducible environments.
